query: Who do I contact for pricing issues?
resolution:
For pricing-related queries, please contact the Pricing Team:

**Point of Contact:** Pricing Support Team
**Email:** pricing-support@bain.com
**Slack:** #pricing-help

Common pricing issues include:
- Pricing Configurator access
- Rate updates
- Opportunity pricing
- Approval workflows

[ACTION_LINK:Email Pricing Team|mailto:pricing-support@bain.com]
[ACTION_LINK:Open Pricing Slack|https://bain.slack.com/channels/pricing-help]

**Point of Contact:** Cortex CRM Support
**Email:** cortex-support@bain.com
**Slack:** #cortex-help
**Office Hours:** Tuesdays & Thursdays 2-3 PM EST

Common Cortex issues include:
- User setup and permissions
- Data migration
- Custom fields and workflows
- Reporting and dashboards

[ACTION_LINK:Email Cortex Team|mailto:cortex-support@bain.com]
[ACTION_LINK:Open Cortex Slack|https://bain.slack.com/channels/cortex-help]

query: Who do I contact for API integrations?
resolution:
For API and integration-related queries, please contact the Integrations Team:

**Point of Contact:** Integration Engineering
**Email:** integrations@bain.com
**Slack:** #integrations-support
**Documentation:** https://api.bain.com/docs

Common integration issues include:
- API credentials and access
- Webhook configuration
- Third-party connections (Slack, Microsoft 365, Okta)
- Data sync issues

[ACTION_LINK:Email Integrations Team|mailto:integrations@bain.com]
[ACTION_LINK:Open Integrations Slack|https://bain.slack.com/channels/integrations-support]

- Hardware issues

query: I have a pricing configurator issue
resolution:
This is a **Pricing Team** issue. Here are your options:

1. **Self-Service:** Try the Pricing Agent for immediate help with common issues
2. **Contact POC:** Email pricing-support@bain.com
3. **Slack:** Post in #pricing-help for quick responses

For urgent issues, please mention 'URGENT' in your message.

[ACTION_LINK:Open Pricing Agent|/agents/pricing|TOOL_CALL:redirectToPricingAgent]
[ACTION_LINK:Email Pricing Team|mailto:pricing-support@bain.com]

query: How do I reset my password?
resolution:
For password resets, follow these steps based on the system:

**Bain Network Password:**
1. Visit https://passwordreset.bain.com
2. Enter your employee ID
3. Follow the verification steps

**Cortex/Salesforce Password:**
1. Go to the login page
2. Click 'Forgot Password'
3. Check your email for reset link

**Other Systems:**
Contact IT Help Desk at it-helpdesk@bain.com

[ACTION_LINK:Reset Bain Password|https://passwordreset.bain.com|TOOL_CALL:resetBainPassword]
[ACTION_LINK:Contact IT Help Desk|mailto:it-helpdesk@bain.com]

[ACTION_LINK:Reset Bain Password|https://passwordreset.bain.com|TOOL_CALL:resetBainPassword]

For VPN connection issues:

1. **Restart VPN Client:** Close and reopen GlobalProtect/Cisco AnyConnect
2. **Check Credentials:** Ensure you're using your current Bain password
3. **Try Different Server:** Select an alternate VPN gateway
4. **Restart Computer:** Sometimes a full restart resolves connection issues

If issues persist, contact IT Help Desk.

[ACTION_LINK:VPN Troubleshooting Guide|https://bain.sharepoint.com/it/vpn-guide]
[ACTION_LINK:Contact IT Help Desk|mailto:it-helpdesk@bain.com|TOOL_CALL:contactITHelpDesk]

query: How do I submit a ServiceNow ticket?
resolution:
To submit a ServiceNow ticket:

1. Go to https://bain.service-now.com
2. Log in with your Bain credentials
3. Click 'Create Incident' or 'Request Something'
4. Fill in the required details:
   - Short description
   - Category
   - Priority
   - Detailed description
5. Attach any relevant screenshots
6. Submit the ticket

You'll receive a ticket number for tracking.

[ACTION_LINK:Open ServiceNow|https://bain.service-now.com|TOOL_CALL:openServiceNow]
[ACTION_LINK:Create New Ticket|https://bain.service-now.com/sp?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id=create|TOOL_CALL:createServiceNowTicket]

1. Go to https://bain.service-now.com

You'll receive a ticket number for tracking.

[ACTION_LINK:Open ServiceNow|https://bain.service-now.com|TOOL_CALL:openServiceNow]
[ACTION_LINK:Create New Ticket|https://bain.service-now.com/sp?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id=create|TOOL_CALL:createServiceNowTicket]

query: What applications are available at Bain?
resolution:
Here are the key applications available at Bain:

**CRM & Sales:**
- Cortex (Salesforce) - CRM platform
- Pricing Configurator - Opportunity pricing

**Productivity:**
- Microsoft 365 - Email, Teams, Office apps
- Workday - HR and time tracking

**Development:**
- API Portal - Integration APIs
- ServiceNow - IT service management

For access to any application, contact the respective team or IT Help Desk.

[ACTION_LINK:View All Applications|https://bain.sharepoint.com/apps]
[ACTION_LINK:Request Access|https://bain.service-now.com/access|TOOL_CALL:requestApplicationAccess]

Here are the key applications available at Bain:

**CRM & Sales:**
- Cortex (Salesforce) - CRM platform
- Pricing Configurator - Opportunity pricing

**Productivity:**
- Microsoft 365 - Email, Teams, Office apps
- Workday - HR and time tracking

**Development:**
- API Portal - Integration APIs
- ServiceNow - IT service management

For access to any application, contact the respective team or IT Help Desk.

[ACTION_LINK:View All Applications|https://bain.sharepoint.com/apps]
[ACTION_LINK:Request Access|https://bain.service-now.com/access|TOOL_CALL:requestApplicationAccess]

query: I need access to an application
resolution:
To request access to a Bain application:

1. Go to ServiceNow Access Request portal
2. Select the application you need access to
3. Provide business justification
4. Submit for manager approval
5. Access is typically granted within 1-2 business days after approval

**Common Applications:**
- Cortex CRM - Contact cortex-support@bain.com
- Pricing Configurator - Contact pricing-support@bain.com
- API Access - Contact integrations@bain.com

[ACTION_LINK:Submit Access Request|https://bain.service-now.com/access|TOOL_CALL:requestApplicationAccess]

For stuck opportunity approvals, this is typically a **Pricing Team** issue:

**Quick Fixes:**
1. Check if the approver is out of office
2. Verify all required fields are completed
3. Check approval workflow status in Cortex

**Escalation:**
If urgent, contact pricing-support@bain.com with the Opportunity ID.

[ACTION_LINK:Open Pricing Agent|/agents/pricing|TOOL_CALL:redirectToPricingAgent]
[ACTION_LINK:Email Pricing Team|mailto:pricing-support@bain.com]

Data sync issues can involve multiple teams depending on the systems:

**Cortex ↔ Pricing:** Contact Pricing Team
**Cortex ↔ External Systems:** Contact Integrations Team
**General Salesforce Sync:** Contact Cortex Team

**Quick Troubleshooting:**
1. Check the last sync timestamp
2. Look for error messages in sync logs
3. Verify API credentials haven't expired

[ACTION_LINK:Open Cortex Agent|/agents/cortex|TOOL_CALL:redirectToCortexAgent]
[ACTION_LINK:Open Integrations Agent|/agents/integrations|TOOL_CALL:redirectToIntegrationsAgent]
